content: the wound in any place you want them to be pull the ends through the bottom of the head and tie off then tuck the ends back into the head body stuff body firmly use tail to sew the body to the bottom of the head weave the end back into the body sew on the belly patch with the double_crochet s at the top weave end back into belly once it s sewn on stuff the legs full but not firm sew legs onto the front toes up with the bottom of the legs at about round 5 slightly overlapping the sides of the belly patch weave ends back into body sew the heart to the left side of the chest weave end back into the heart stuff the arms lightly filling the paws then adding very little into the arm flatten the tops of arms then sew thumbs forward to side of body below the ears i like to angle them slightly forward weave ends back into body fold tail flat and sew onto the butt over rounds 8-9 of the body add any stitch/wound marks you want on the body arms & legs the same as for the head your zombear buddy is finished and ready to be loved
